client.controller

Class PermissionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controller.PermissionController

  • final class PermissionController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the permissions for the Client and GUI
    Since:
    March 30th 2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sean Kenny and Jean-David Rousseau

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PermissionController(Client user, GUI frame)
      Creates a permission controller for a given user and frame

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changePermissionToAdmin()
      changes the permission to admin for this user
      void changePermissionToCustomer()
      changes the permission to customer for this user
      void changePermissionToGuest()
      returns permission to guest for this user
      void clearDataOnAllGUIS()
      clears the data on every active GUI
      void manageInvalidLogin()
      displays a message if the credentials were invalid
